changelog:
## BurgTV v1.0.94

### Catch-up / Timeshift
- Fix: Catch-up playback now works (matched CDN headers via mitmproxy capture)
- Fix: Removed :80 default port from timeshift URLs
- Fix: Added Icy-MetaData and identity encoding headers
- Fix: URL probe changed from HEAD to GET (CDN compatibility)

### Security
- EncryptedSharedPreferences for PremiumManager
- PIN rate limiting (5 attempts + 5min lockout)
- Sensitive data removed from logs

### Profiles
- PIN required for create/delete/manage profiles
- Dashboard remembers last section per-profile

### Translations
- 725 Italian strings added
- 13 languages fully translated
